document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Zeugophora (Coleoptera, Megalopodidae, Zeugophorinae) in Japan

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the genus Zeugophora (Coleoptera, Megalopodidae, Zeugophorinae) in Japan

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pedrillia annulata var. disconotata
Pic, 1906: 27
[ type locality: Japan ],
Chûjô, 1932: 340
[ Japan ];
Ohno, 1961: 37
, synonymized with
Pedrillia annulata .

Pedrillia annulata
ab. theresae
Pic, 1945: 13
[ type locality: Siberia].

Zeugophora ( Pedrillia ) annulata
f. inannulata
Chûjô, 1959: 1
[ type locality: Japan : Aomori Pref. Mt. Ozaki].

Zeugophora ( Pedrillia ) annulata
f. melanaria
Chûjô, 1959: 1
[ type locality: Japan : Aomori Pref. Mt. Ozaki].

Pedrillia biguttata
Kraatz, 1879: 119
[ type locality: Russia : Amur ], synonymized by
Ohno, 1961: 37
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Description. Measurement. Body length: PEL, male, 3.12–4.10 mm , female, 2.94–4.43 mm . Width: EW, male, 1.54–2.21 mm , female, 1.41–2.35 mm . Biometric data are given in Table 1 .

caption.paragraph:
TABLE 1. Biometric data for
Zeugophora annulata Baly, 1805
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Coloration ( Fig. 3 A–O). Body reddish orange. Head usually reddish orange, sometimes black on vertex (fig. 3D–O). Apex of mandible black. Antennae black except first and second segments. Color pattern of pronotum various: without black spot ( Fig. 3A, B ); mostly black ( Fig. 3 H–M, O); or central area with a black spot ( Fig. 3C, D, F ). Scutellum orange or black. Elytra usually reddish orange, but pattern can vary: in many cases, represented by two black-bordered white or yellow spots posteriorly ( Fig. 3 B–E). Meso- and metepisterna black. Metaventrite black except central area. Dorsal surface of fore femora blackened ( Fig. 3B, C , H–N) or fully testaceous (fig. 3A, D, F, G, O). Dorsal surfaces of middle and hind femora black; ventral surfaces of hind femora black except posterior half.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 2. Habitus of
Zeugophora
spp. A.
Z . annulata
, male, dorsal view; B. Ditto, ventral view; C. Ditto, lateral view; D.
Z. nigricollis
, male, dorsal view; E. Ditto, ventral view; F. Ditto, lateral view; G.
Z. unifasciata
, female, dorsal view; H. Ditto, ventral view; I. Ditto lateral view.

FIGURE 3. Color pattern of
Zeugophora annulata ( Baly, 1873 )
of Japan.

FIGURE 4.
Zeugophora annulata ( Baly, 1873 )
. A. Pronotum, dorsal view; B. Thorax, ventral view; C. Antenna; D. Mandible, left part. Scales. A–C. 1 mm; D. 100μm.

FIGURE 5.
Zeugophora annulata ( Baly, 1873 )
. A. Head; B. Pronotum, dorsal view; C. Thorax ventral view; D. Male posterior margin of 7th sternite; E. Female posterior margin of 7th sternite.

subSubSection.paragraph: Legs densely furnished with setae; tibial setae becoming longer and denser apically. Hind femora thickened. Fore tibiae straight; mid tibiae bowed on apical half; hind tibiae weakly bowed and feebly widened near apex; mid and hind tibiae with a sharply defined and finely crenulate carina along external face. Apex of protibia with one spur; apices of meso- and metatibiae with two spurs. Tarsi distinctly shorter than tibiae, and basal three segments gradually widened apically.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 6. Setiferous punctures of
Zeugophora annulata ( Baly, 1873 )
. A. Head surface; B. Pronotum; C. Metaventrite; D. Elytron.

FIGURE 7.
Zeugophora annulata ( Baly, 1873 )
. A. Median lobe, lateral view; B. Apex of median lobe, dorsal view; C. Tegmen, dorsal view; D. Spiculum; E. 8th sternite, ventral view; F. 8th sternite, dorsal view; G. Spermatheca.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks .
Zeugophora
.
annulata
is easily distinguished from other Japanese species by the above-mentioned elytral color pattern. Only coloration for Japanese specimens were examined and illustrated in this study though the pattern may vary further in foreign populations ( Fig. 3 ).

Types .
Paratype 1 ex. , sex unknown ( TARI ): "
Pedrillia annulata, No. 1895
–1897", " WADA-TOGE , JAPAN ,
1.VIII.1881
, Col. G. Lewis ", "Co Type", "1896"," Pedrillia annulata BALY , DET . M. CHUJO "
;
Holotype ♀ ( ELKU ): " Mt. Ozaki-yama , aomori Pref. Honshu, JAPAN ,
4.IV.1940
, Coll. K. Shimoyama ", " Holotype ", " Zeugophora (Pe- drillia) annulata (Baly) f. inannulata Chûjô, DET . M. CHUJO 1959 "
;
Holotype 1 ex. , sex unknown ( ELKU ): " Mt. Ozaki-yama , Aomori Pref. Honshu , JAPAN ,
6.IV.1940
, Coll. K. SHIMOYAMA", " Holotype ", " Zeugophora (Pedrillia) annulata ( BALY ) f. melanaria CHÛJÔ , DET . M. CHUJO 1959 "
, ".
